entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Type.GetEnumValuesAsUnderlyingType #72498
  • [NativeAOT] The Finalize method is not preserved via reflection #72494
  • [API Proposal]: Provide a result returning Parallel.ForEachAsync overload #72489
  • JSImportGenerator is introducing analyzer source-build prebuilts #72486
  • [wasm-ep] End-to-end workflow for profiled AOT using EventPIpe #72481
    8.0.0
  • WebSockets over HTTP/1.1 with HttpClient fails #72476
  • NonBacktracking engine is not producing the same match as other engines for multiline cases with empty matches #72470
    7.0.0
  • Randomly occurring ExecutionEngineException seemingly caused by GC #72466
    7.0.0
  • normal-microsoft.extensions.configuration.binder.tests work item #72465
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `ConfigurationBinderTests.CanBindNonInstantiatedSortedSetWithSomeValues` failing when tests are trimmed #72461
    7.0.0
  • JIT/opt/ValueNumbering/TypeTestFolding fails on mono LLVM AOT #72460
    7.0.0
  • New Socket.Select TimeSpan-based overload is broken for Timeout.InfiniteTimeSpan #72458
    7.0.0
  • ArgumentNullException in dotnet.6.0.7.hr41unoldr.js #72457
  • Windows Server 2022 - Setting affinity in .NET 6 application errors #72441
  • Align Mono and coreclr behavior for thiscall without arguments #72438
  • [wasm][wbt] - Microsoft.Playwright.PlaywrightException : net::ERR_UNSAFE_PORT #72436
  • When building coreclr in M1 OSX (arm64), the symbols of corprof artifacts is in amd64 NOT arm64 and that causes build error when building a dotnet profiler for m1 environment #72432
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.SpanTests.ReadOnlySpanTests.TestMatchTwo_Char #72427
  • msbuild Publish fails with Error: Invalid directory size. #72425
  • System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Bmi2 - ADCX and ADOX instructions missing. #72423
    Future
  • Test failure file_io.GetSystemTimeAsFileTime.test1 #72421
  • Test failure profiler/elt/slowpatheltleave/slowpatheltleave.sh #72420
  • Increase NativeAOT testing when NativeAOT is changed #72419

Closed

  • Android: Next Steps #7556
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'i < BitSetTraits::GetSize(env)' in during 'Redundant branch opts' #71599
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests causing OSX queue backup from uploading dump #65000
    7.0.0
  • Test Failure：System.Net.Sockets.Tests.TelemetryTest.EventSource_SocketConnectsRemote_LogsConnectStartStop #55382
    7.0.0
  • OptionsCache cached an Exception #57496
    7.0.0
  • Unable to run .NET 5.0 service as a different user #51269
    7.0.0
  • `UpgradeToRegexGeneratorCodeFixer` crashes with `InvalidCastException` #72047
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Tests.HostTests.CreateDefaultBuilder_SecretsDoesReload #68453
    7.0.0
  • CreateDefaultBuilder_SecretsDoesReload test failed in CI #48696
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Could not load ICU data. UErrorCode: 2 Abortado #71275
  • SDL signoff requirements - please enable additional C/C++ compiler warnings #66154
    7.0.0
  • TypeConverter.ConvertFrom does not support trimming but is not attributed as such. #72006
  • "coreclr Pri0 Runtime Tests Run windows arm64 check" timeouts #72182
  • Winmm error with latest version of System.Speech package #69776
  • [API Proposal]: Efficiently matching multiple strings. #69682
    Future
  • `Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.Tests` test fails with `System.UnauthorizedAccessException` #56810
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Physical.PhysicalFilesWatcher.RaiseChangeEvents takes down process on an IO exception #71003
    7.0.0
  • Confusing message on Http timeout #67505
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SyncHttpHandler_DiagnosticsTest.SendAsync_SuppressedGlobalStaticPropagationEnvVar failing in CI #72428
    7.0.0
  • system.net.quic.functional.tests failing with stack buffer overflow #72429
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.ReadOnlySequenceTests<Byte> #70844
    7.0.0
  • C#: Different output for ToString("X2") #72426
  • `GC\Features\SustainedLowLatency\scenario` fails #65797
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.ContentLengthReadStream should provide the length of the stream #71190
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Default Constructor for String #72468
  • MultipartFormDataContent potentially not compliant with RFC 6266 and RFC 7578 #72447
    7.0.0
  • runtime-libraries stress-ssl pipeline is constantly failing #72340
    7.0.0
  • CG2 runtime crash in JIT\Regression\JitBlue\Runtime_34170\Runtime_34170\Runtime_34170.cmd #53560
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\interlocked\\compareexchange\\CompareExchangeTString\\CompareExchangeTString.cmd #58090
    7.0.0
  • Test failure:baseservices/threading/interlocked/exchange/exchangedouble/exchangedouble.sh #56952
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/interlocked/exchange/exchangefloat/exchangefloat.sh #59009
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\interlocked\\compareexchange\\CompareExchangeTClass_1\\CompareExchangeTClass_1.cmd #57903
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: src/tests/baseservices/exceptions/stackoverflow/stackoverflowtester #57147
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices/TieredCompilation/BasicTest_QuickJitOff/BasicTest_QuickJitOff.sh #59613
    7.0.0
  • ReadyToRun compilation of WinUI projects fails under .NET 6 #58035
    7.0.0
  • .NET Core - code is very slow when run on a computer with many cores #54276
    7.0.0
  • HttpStress is not running on Windows in CI #72096
    7.0.0
  • Run test baseservices/TieredCompilation/BasicTest_QuickJitOn_R2r/BasicTest_QuickJitOn_R2r.sh #59612
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ExternalContainers.Tests Run checked coreclr OSX x64 Debug failed #63946
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests.ByteMixingOrNativeAVE_MinimalFailingTest #72422
    7.0.0
  • [Quic] System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests.WriteTests timeout in rolling build #72196
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/eh/basics/trythrowcatchfinally_d/trythrowcatchfinally_d.sh #64504
    7.0.0
  • Stack overflow and Consistency check failed: FAILED: m_crawl.pFrame->IsTransitionToNativeFrame() in System.Runtime.Tests #57807
    7.0.0
  • Plagued with 'System.OutOfMemoryException' errors in .NET 7 Preview 4 #70718
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\regressions\\Dev11\\154243\\dynamicmethodliveness\\dynamicmethodliveness.cmd #59449
    7.0.0
  • Test timeout: JIT\\Regression\\CLR-x86-JIT\\V2.0-Beta2\\b426654\\b426654\\b426654.cmd #50615
    7.0.0
  • [libraries-pgo] NRE in System.Collections.Immutable.Tests.ImmutableArrayBuilderTest.IndexOf #72363
    7.0.0
  • VS2022 Blazor Debugger doesn't show the generic types in a method #71553
    7.0.0
  • Open Generics mixed with Closed Generics in dependency injection #64995
    Future
  • [iOS/tvOS] System.IO.Compression.Tests.ZipFile_ZipArchive_Extract.ExtractToDirectoryExtension_Unicode on devices #60582
    7.0.0
  • [iOS/tvOS Simulator][x64] System.Tests.AppDomainTests.TestingCreateInstanceFromObjectHandle test failed #65560
    7.0.0
  • Serialization issue in .NET 6 Blazor after publishing #68826
    7.0.0
  • Reuse JsonSerializerOptions when used with JsonSerializerContext #64025
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.Json serialization callback context #59892
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: JsonBoolHandling #61097
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Developers have QUIC library so they can develop their own protocols on top #57601
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Developers can build libraries for HTTP/3 to meet their client/server needs (.NET 7) #57600
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IStructEnumerable<T, TEnumerator> #71297
  • Test failure: TestLoopbackAsync #56087
    7.0.0
  • Skip() on IReadOnlyList needlessly enumerates skipped items #72424
  • QUIC: DefaultStreamErrorCode and DefaultCloseErrorCode default values cause error #72160
    7.0.0
  • iOS: crash when profiling dotnet-podcasts #71492
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.ServerAsyncAuthenticateTest.ServerAsyncAuthenticate_EachSupportedProtocol_Success(protocol: Ssl3) #67076
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'argsToReverse' in 'Program:<Main>$(System.String[])' during 'Importation' #71874
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAot] Fixing Resources.Reader and ComponentModel tests #72497
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Support for RequiresAttributeMismatch testing #72496
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] ThisCall with no arguments is invalid #72495
    area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • Warn on trimming with COM hosting (built-in COM support) enabled #72493
    area-Host
  • Fix PAL GetFullPathNameA test3 #72492
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Re-enable test that passes locally #72491
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Adding rust tests for match boundaries #72490
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Move UnsupportedOSPlatform from class to methods for MD5 and HMACMD5 #72488
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Remove hard-coded RunAnalyzer property in JSImportGenerator #72487
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Fix Configuration Binder Test with WASM and Trimming #72485
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.0
  • [libs] Add EventSourceSupport to CountersTest #72484
    area-System.Runtime.Caching
  • Ensure metadata originating from converters is surfaced while JsonTypeInfo is mutable. #72483
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-ep] Implement DiagnosticServer and startup sessions for WebAssembly #72482
    arch-wasm, area-Tracing-mono
  • Update recursive resource load message #72480
    area-System.Resources
  • [mono][aot] Avoid an assert when encoding fnptr classes. #72479
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix for m_alignpad == 0 assertion failure #72475
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update /// comments for new InteropServices APIs #72473
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • port BitArray.And, Or, Xor and Not to Vector<T> #72471
    area-System.Collections
  • [iOS] Use different tvOS helix queue for PR's #72467
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Consume renamed ApiCompat.Task package #72464
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add missing System.Net docs #72459
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Use `GetTempPath2W` if available. #72452
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update NuGet reference versions #72451
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Additional tests for 71619 #72449
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • #53624 enable test suites in maccatalyst #72445
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Mark b311420 test GC Stress incompatible on all platforms #72444
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: Testing mono llvmfullaot with interpreter as a fallback instead of GSHAREDVTs #72443
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update llvm-libunwind from v9.0.0 to v14.0.6 #72442
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Rename [RegexGenerator] to [Regex] #72434
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Handle blittable byref returns in built-in marshalling #72433
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Ensure prerequisites are installed on the perf pipeline #72431
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fixes a key partner Watson bucketing for Linux coredumps #72417
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.9

Merged

  • Don't run optJumpThreading when fgCurBBEpochSize != (fgBBNumMax + 1) #72440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert tar header struct to class #72472
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Native AOT runtime changes for multiple package conflict #72346
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Guard against unreachable remote server in Sockest TelemetryTest #72446
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • Correctly find the node to fix in regex generator codefix #72079
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Strip localized System.CommandLine resources from CoreCLR tools #72478
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add missing docs for RegexRunner.Scan #72453
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add missing docs for PeriodicTimer #72454
    area-System.Threading
  • Add missing System.Timers.Timer docs #72455
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Make PhysicalFileProvider polling more resilient to IO exceptions #72462
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, 7.0.0
  • Avoid adding an HttpClient.Timeout message to ConnectTimeout exceptions #72274
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Revert "Support OpenSSL-based MsQuic on Windows (#72262)" #72456
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/7.0-preview7] Fix incorrect buffer reallocation in AcceptSecurityContext #72339
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Removed duplicated testcases as a follow-up for #70560 #71827
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Clean up of tests from V1/V2 marshaller shape split #72392
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Working Windows image for HttpStress and SslStress #72271
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [QUIC] Fixed disabled receives if buffer gets drained before RECEIVE returns #72439
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [iOS] Bump simulator test queues to use MacOS 12 #72384
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Avoid using type info from GDV guesses during import #72376
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expand API documentation of contract customization APIs. #72388
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Block Matrix4x4CreateFromAxisAngleTest test on NativeAOT #72437
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove unnecessary call to Path.GetTempPath #72414
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • #60582 enable ExtractToDirectoryExtension_Unicode on ios/tvos #72091
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • #65560 Added FileCreateCaseSensitive for ios/tvos simulators #71948
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • Ensure reflection-based metadata instantiations unwrap TargetInvocationException. #72397
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Listener AcceptConnectionAsync propagates errors from failed handshake #72390
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add an area-owners.json file. Remove unused area. Format MD table. #72309
    area-Meta, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Add X509 SAN extension and RFC6125 MatchesHostname #72304
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Make `Enum.GetValues` AOT-safe #72236
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: teach VN to fold type comparisons #72136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #67049
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove wrong cgroups assert #72372
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Android] Introduce NetTraceToMibcConverter task & streamline testing targets #72394
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add analyzer for validating NativeMarshallingAttribute and parameters of CustomMarshallerAttribute #72299
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] improve startup #72275
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Modify workload to pick threading runtime packs #72412
    area-Build-mono
  • Include EventLog.Messages in WindowsDesktop pack #72280
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #72143
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Tear down pending HTTP connection when the originating request completes #71785
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Fix an infinite loop in the abcrem pass. #72213
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Adapt System.CommandLine (v2) in more places #72082
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix some System.Net tests #71385
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0][mono] add 400 band workloads #72379
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix debugger funceval deadlock #72179
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • fix: [Wasm] Adjust windows build #70689
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] EmccCompile: Add support for compiling sequentially #67483
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, needs-author-action
  • WIP: Svm diamond shape without mono exclusion #70045
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Console.Unix: fix missing terminal configuration on SIGINT/SIGQUIT/SGCONT. #64985

  • [release/6.0] [mono] Ensure exception_message points to a string #72002
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.9

    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Hot cold splitting] Support split-eh #1918

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix duplicate Scratch generation #1939
  • Patched Fields Branch #1938
  • Disable splitting for switch tables when inlining #1937

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet build --framework builds referenced project twice #26690
  • sdk style project with .net framework 3.5 got incorrect result in VS2022 17.2.6(mscorlib.dll and nlp files copied) #26685

Closed

  • Make it possible to use newer ILCompiler packages than what SDK comes with #26268
    7.0.1xx
  • VisualStudioWorkloads is not source-build compatible #25616
  • Feature Request: Ability to import implicit usings from a ProjectReference #26679
    Discussion
  • What is the usage of MS.NETCore.App.Host 3.1 and 6.0 in SDK and can it be removed for source-build? #26482
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't set ObjCopyName in testing #26687

Merged

  • Try out pre-downloading the test packages on the helix machines #25055
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • ApiCompat: Add ValidateAssemblies msbuild task and add global tool #26616
    Area-Compatibility
  • BinaryFormatter obsolete as error in net7 #26559
  • Support for msbuild/build event #26427
    Area-NetSDK
  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default #26143
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1891103 #26571
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trim response file lines to prevent forwarding along whitespace-only tokens #26627
    Area-Infrastructure
  • MSBuild server V2 #26104
    Area-CLI
  • Migrate dotnet new Cli, dotnet-new3, *.IntegrationTests, *.UnitTests, template_feed to SDK #26521
    Area-Templates

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal] Allow overriding single accessor properties with multiple accessors #1568

Updated

  • Proposal: list pattern #3435
    Working Set
  • Disallow interfaces with static virtual members as type arguments #5955
  • [Proposal]: Support generics and generic type parameters in aliases #1239
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • ref fields updates #6285
  • Add lambda/method group defaults proposal #6274

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement support for pull diagnostic requests on additional files #62781
    17.4
  • Support RefEscapesAttribute to allow marking implicitly `scoped ref` parameters as unscoped #62780
    17.4
  • Rename operation should have a wait dialog #62777
  • Cannot get the size of a value tuple in the expression evaluator in the debugger #62776
  • Remaining work to get pull diagnostics + LSP fully enabled, and all push-diagnostics + error list code removed. #62772
    17.4
  • Improve error message for a `scoped ref` parameter returned by reference #62768

Closed

  • [Feature Extension] Pull Members Up Should allow multiple selection for quick action #55612
    Backlog
  • Don't report generator init failures as watsons #57315
    17.4
  • Rule listed as "csharp_style..." can change functionality #59263
    Backlog
  • IDE0029 results in a behaviour change when the comparison operator is overridden #62765
  • Removing unused parameters from operators is suggested #62767
  • [LSP] Support language experiences for roslyn options in editorconfig files #61154
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow for Parsing Lambda Default Parameters #62782
    Area-Compilers
  • `ref` parameters to `ref struct` types should be `scoped ref` by default #62778
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Allow lightbulbs to make text changes, even if an intermediary workspace change occurred. #62775
    Area-IDE
  • Optimize away unchecked conversions between nint and nuint types. #62774
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Fix NRE in nullable walker #62773
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62770
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove unneeded 'using OptionSet = ...' #62769
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Rename `IPerLanguageOption` and `ILanguageSpecificOption` and add LanguageName property #62766
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62749
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62763
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62762
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up global options usage in tests #62692
    Area-IDE

    Area-IDE
  • Produce errors for 'partial file record' #62686
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix project based CompletionProvider #61976
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • Support ref field assignment in object initializers #62584
    Area-Compilers
  • Block constant and relational pattern matching on types inheriting from or constrained to INumberBase<T> #62653
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix cref tags on generated VB's SyntaxFactory #62578
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix GetNext/PreviousDirective's handling of duplicate trivia #62760
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add external access for unit test generation #62633
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify `AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer` constructors #62736

  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641

  • Cleanup AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #60537
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Find references to type-parameters used in object-creation expressions. #62752

  • Revert "Revert "Generalize RoamingProfileStorageLocation to ClientSettingsStorageLocation (#62684)"" #62759
    Area-IDE
  • Use actual equivalence keys, not loc strings to distinguish helpers #62740

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine EnableCoreHostTraceLogging_FileCaptureNativeLogs #42820
  • Support Opt-in IIS Express Launch Setting for ASP.NET Core Templates #42818
    .NET 8 Planning
  • jQuery License outdated #42815
    7.0-rc1
  • Faster creating query string in 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Extensions.QueryBuilder' #42810
  • [7.0.100-rc.1.22365.7] Behavior difference when add Authentication in web applications #42808
    7.0-rc1
  • When the logging fields is all, the request query is not logging #42807
  • JS Client reconnection, HubConnection.ts. Incorrect number of reconnection attempts is logged. #42806
    Backlog
  • Issue with IAccessTokenProvider on iOS devices #42805

Closed

  • ProblemDetails is not returned for 404NotFound and 500Exception #4953
    7.0-preview7
  • failed to start process with commandline #42680
  • Explicit binding source should work for [FromBody] Stream body in Minimal APIs #41486
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ConfigureRouteHandlerJsonOptions naming #42718
    7.0-rc1
  • Blazor component state is not preserved when handling errors #38757
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ValueProvider array of strings having a null value is processed wrong #40929
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Usage of ProblemDetails is inconsistent throughout ASP.NET Core #32957
    7.0-preview7
  • Skipped `internal` properties on InvokeAsync<T> calls #42768
  • Disable Tracing in production #42776
  • Allow @ref be used with existing declaration syntax, instead of having to declare it seperately #42804
  • Enable BindNever or BindingBehavior(BindingBehavior.Never) for Blazor WebAssembly Shared Project(Model) #42736
  • QuickGrid: QuickGridItemsProvider naming suggestion #42738
    Discussions
  • Kestrel: Wrong certificate used #42642

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove RequestDelegateFactory call from RouteEndpointBuilder #42827
    area-runtime
  • Do not treat warnings as errors for `SendHelixJob` #42826
    area-infrastructure
  • Allow Collection Default Value binding #42824
    area-web-frameworks
  • Fix typo #42823
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Add dotnet-sourcebuild-externals reference for user-jwts dependencies #42822
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine EnableCoreHostTraceLogging_FileCaptureNativeLogs #42821
    area-runtime
  • Better support for HTTP/2 in SignalR .NET client #42817
    blocked, area-signalr, signalr-client-net
  • [blazor] Obsolete InvokeUnmarshalled #42814
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 7.0-rc1
  • Allowing `nullable struct` with `AsParameters` attribute #42812
    area-web-frameworks
  • [draft][blazor] replace internal methods but keep them mockable #42811
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-rc.1.22368.21 #42803
    area-infrastructure
  • Leverage auto-registration of AuthNZ middlewares #42802
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Clean up localization files #42797
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-rc1
  • Allowing explicit `FromBody` for raw body (`PipeReader` and `Stream`) #42816
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Forward port "Improve Default Blazor WebAssembly Loading Experience" #42813
    7.0-rc1
  • Avoid always setting request body parameter #42748
    feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Rename ConfigureRouteHandlerJsonOptions to ConfigureHttpJsonOptions #42747
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix CollectionModelBinder BindSimpleCollection null value handling #42278
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Backport/pr 42384 to release/7.0 preview7 #42809
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • Backport/pr 42384 to release/7.0 preview7 #42741
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Remove unused namespace from webapi template #42798
    area-mvc, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Task and ValueTask are not covariant #41719
    area-runtime
  • Make route handler filters work for MVC controllers #42557
    area-mvc
  • [SignalR] [.NET Client] Retry HTTP request on auth failure #42671
    area-signalr
  • Allow to bind StringValues for optional HTTP requests params with Minimal APIs #41789
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Log a warning when using an untrusted developer certificate #42621
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Allow cancellation of navigation events in Blazor #42638
    area-blazor
  • Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime, blog-candidate, 7.0-preview7
  • [Migrated] - Generate Composite Images Redistributable #42506
    area-infrastructure
  • HTTP/3: Complete support for UseHttps #42774
    area-runtime
  • [SignalR] Avoid blocking common InvokeAsync usage #42796
    area-signalr
  • Trim identity #42675
    area-identity
  • HTTP/3: Avoid per-request cancellation token allocations #42685
    area-runtime
  • Cleanup AspNetCoreAnalyzers #42757
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Move builds to MacOS 11 #42792
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/3.1] Move builds to MacOS 11 #42793
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/2.1] Move builds to MacOS 11 #42795
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Move builds to MacOS 11 #42791
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make FontImageSourceExtension inherit from BindableObject #8850
  • [BUG] Published executable file fails to start in Windows #8847
  • HRESULT E_FAIL with Rectangle with margin and no stroke #8846
  • Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #8845
  • WinUI targets require location permissions set in manifest when asking for location #8842
  • TranslationY does not work on Frame component #8840
  • Assertion failure #8835
  • Flyout items can vanish when arrowing down through a flyout #8834
  • MT1008: Failed to launch the simulator: Value cannot be null. #8833
  • Intent filter throws an exception in maui #8832
  • Android Resource file is not included in the app build #8831
  • Run Maui MSI on window server 2019 not working. #8830
  • MAUI Workload version vs .Net SDK version #8828
  • Minimize/Maximize/Close button on the right corner of header of window is not working #8827
  • [BUG] FontImageSource will not use Color of Parent Button #8826
  • Make IProvideParentValues public #8825
  • XAML Extensions ServiceProvider should have access to the Scoped ServiceProvider #8824
  • Separate Window Management from IApplication #8823

Closed

  • Enabling CheckBox does not change visual state #6727
    6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Setting the background color on entry changes the underline color as well #6207
    6.0-servicing
  • Entry decoration on Android not correct. #8067

    area/controls 🎮, 6.0-servicing

Updated

  • [Android] Correctly notify CheckBox Color changes #7084

  • Disconnect old handler after setting new handler #8781
  • [iOS] Implement IsEnabled property on Editor #7611

  • Add Obsolete attribute to MessagingCenter #8765
